attributes.action: Drivers aged 65+ must retake their driving test or have their licence revoked
attributes.additional_details:
In 2011, there were 10'974 road accidents involving people over the age of 70.
In the same year, there were 111 deaths on the road of people between the ages of 70 and 80
attributes.background: Elderly drivers are often dangerous and aggravating due to their slow reaction times. This slows down the traffic on the roads and elderly people are responsible for road accidents per year.
